roleset.name: laud, praise
roleset.note: EXTOL-V NOTES: Frame by Claire (from extol.01-v)

example.name: With Manner
example.text: Today, we-9 gather here *-9 to extol the glory and joy of democracy with songs of the land and the voice of the people.
example.arg: the glory and joy of democracy
with songs of the land and the voice ofthe people

example.name: All Arguments, extolled as
example.text: During the ceremony, [President Chen]-1 read out the eight vows, drafted * by Bo Yangfor, his "Human Rights Marriage Certificate," *-1 extolling mutual respect for human rights as the foundation of social stability.
example.arg: as the foundation of social stability
